descriptionlist.description:
• Just swipe right.
Easily add dialogs to one or more groups by swiping right. When you want to remove a dialog from the group, just swipe right again and delete it.
• Personalize your groups.
Don't like the default groups? Make them yours. Reset groups, change their names and more in the group settings.
• Easy search for new messages ..
Groups containing unread messages will display the red group name in the main submenu, rather than the usual blue name..
